Some of the current DREAM users and collaborators:

  • Hai Lin, Environment Canada, Montreal, Canada.
  • Tercio Ambrizzi and his students Jose Landreo Campos and Lais Tabosa Machado at IAG, University of Sao Paulo, Sao Paulo, Brazil.
  • Christ Thorncroft and his students Yuan-Ming Cheng and Victor Torres at SUNY, Albany, New York, USA.
  • George Kiladis at ESRL, NOAA, Boulder, Colorado, USA.

If you want to join the group, please contact us by email!

About This Site
